Package skywaysolutions.app.sales

Class SaleController

java.lang.Object
skywaysolutions.app.sales.SaleController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISalesAccessor, IRepairable
public class SaleController extends Object implements ISalesAccessor
This class provides an implementation of a sales accessor.
Author:
Alfred Manville

  • Constructor Details

    • SaleController

      public SaleController(IDB_Connector conn, IRateAccessor rateAccessor, IStockAccessor stockAccessor) throws CheckedException
      Constructs a new instance of sale controller with the specified connection, stock accessor and rate accessor.
      Parameters:
      conn - The database connection to use.
      rateAccessor - The rate accessor to use.
      stockAccessor - The stock accessor to use.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Assuring the table schema has errored.

  • Method Details

    • sell

      public long sell(long blank, long customer, SaleType type, Decimal commissionRate, Date dueDate, Date saleDate, Decimal cost, Decimal tax, Decimal secondaryTax, String currency, Decimal costPreDiscount) throws CheckedException
      Sells a blank to the specified customer for the specified type of sale, with a specific commission rate, a due date, a sale date, a cost, taxes, currency and a cost pre discount.
      Specified by:
      sell in interface ISalesAccessor
      Parameters:
      blank - The blank to be sold.
      customer - The customer ID to sell the blank to.
      type - The type of sale.
      commissionRate - The commission rate on the sale.
      dueDate - The due date of the sales payments.
      saleDate - The date the sale was created.
      cost - The cost of the blank.
      tax - The tax on the blank.
      secondaryTax - The secondary tax on the blank.
      currency - The currency of the sale.
      costPreDiscount - The cost pre discount, can be null.
      Returns:
      The sale ID.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurred during the sale.

    • transact

      public long transact(long saleID, Date date, String currency, Payment payment) throws CheckedException
      Performs a transaction for the specified sale on a specified date with the type of currency being used and the payment being made.
      Specified by:
      transact in interface ISalesAccessor
      Parameters:
      saleID - The ID of the sale.
      date - The date of the transaction.
      currency - The currency of the transaction.
      payment - The payment of the transaction.
      Returns:
      The transaction ID.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurred during the transaction.

    • refund

      public long[] refund(long saleID, Date date) throws CheckedException
      Refunds or gets the refunds of a sale.
      Specified by:
      refund in interface ISalesAccessor
      Parameters:
      saleID - The sale ID.
      date - The date of any new refunds (null to get existing refunds).
      Returns:
      The IDs of the refunds.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The refund operation / obtaining the refund IDs has failed.

    • getSales

      public long[] getSales(MonthPeriod period, PaymentType type, String currency) throws CheckedException
      Gets the sales given the period, type of payment and the currency.
      Specified by:
      getSales in interface ISalesAccessor
      Parameters:
      period - The month of the sales (Null for any time).
      type - The type of payment.
      currency - The currency of the sale, if null, this filter is ignored.
      Returns:
      An array of sale IDs.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the sales has failed.

      Parameters:

      currency - The currency of the sale, if null, this filter is ignored.

      An array of sale IDs.
